channel.itunes:subtitle: A Star Trek fan audio drama set aboard the Federation Deep Space Station 3 (DS3)
channel.itunes:author: Giant Gnome Productions
channel.itunes:summary: Star Trek Audio Drama from Giant Gnome Productions. Life is good for Lt. Greg Torkelson aboard the USS Remington, a Starfleet research vessel stationed near the Venderis Nebula. However, when word comes that he’s been promoted to the Executive Officer of Deep Space Station 3, an outpost in the backwaters of Federation space, he quickly discovers that all is not as it appears, and what seems to be too good to be true just might be. "In the darkest reaches of the United Federation of Planets, an isolated station stands sentinel over a neglected frontier. Commissioned long ago with high hopes, its promise is now all but forgotten; a lonely outpost serving as the gateway to the vast expanse beyond, where discovery… and adventure… await." - Lt. Commander Gregory Torkelson]]>
channel.description:
Life is good for Lt. Greg Torkelson aboard the USS Remington, a Starfleet research vessel stationed near the Venderis Nebula. However, when word comes that he’s been promoted to the Executive Officer of Deep Space Station 3, an outpost in the backwaters of Federation space, he quickly discovers that all is not as it appears, and what seems to be too good to be true just might be.
"In the darkest reaches of the United Federation of Planets, an isolated station stands sentinel over a neglected frontier. Commissioned long ago with high hopes, its promise is now all but forgotten; a lonely outpost serving as the gateway to the vast expanse beyond, where discovery… and adventure… await." - Lt. Commander Gregory Torkelson

item.title: Star Trek: Outpost – Episode 1 – What Could Be So Bad?
item.itunes:author: Giant Gnome Productions
item.description:
Life is good for Lt. Greg Torkelson aboard the USS Remington, a Starfleet research vessel stationed near the Venderis Nebula. However, when word comes that he’s been promoted to the Executive Officer of Deep Space Station 3, an outpost in the backwaters of Federation space, he quickly discovers that all is not as it appears, and what seems to be too good to be true just might be.
Cast & Crew Robert Pepper as Lt. Commander Greg Torkelson Katie Gomez as Lt. Renova Exler Eleiece Krawiec as Dr. Rachel Winston John Specht as Chief Burt "Hard" Knox Cathy Rinella as Lt. Jennifer Forrestal Damon Fries as Ensign Kyle Nick Armstrong as Med Tech Giles Kim Johnson as Med Tech Johnson Travis Whelpley as DaiMon Yurrel Jules Ismail as Goshen Melissa D. Johnson as Lt. Karen Denali Edward Gore as Captain Montaine Buchanan Paul Lavelle as Captain Steele CC Petersen as Captain Baker Mark Zaricor as Captain Tyrellian Chris Lipscombe as Klingon PA Announcer Barry Wallace as Alien PA Announcer and Communications Officer Myka Raymond as Computer and Human PA Announcer
Production Team Writers/Directors/Producers: Daniel McIntosh and Tony Raymond Executive Producer: Waleed Ovase Audio Engineer: Tony Raymond Announcer: Paul Lavelle
The post Star Trek: Outpost - Episode 1 - What Could Be So Bad? appeared first on Giant Gnome Productions.
Release Date: April 5, 2009]]>
